subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Landon Donovan scored his first goal in the English Premier League, helping Everton defeat Sunderland, 2-0, on Wednesday. Donovan, on a 10-week loan from Major League Soccer’s Los Angeles Galaxy, scored in the 19th minute with a left-footed shot off a headed pass from Tim Cahill, who headed in the first goal in the sixth minute.
